query:
WITH test_runs AS (
  SELECT 
    *
  FROM 
    commons.workflow_run 
  WHERE 
    workflow_run._event_time >= PARSE_DATETIME_ISO8601('2023-04-27T00:00:00.000Z') 
    --AND workflow_run._event_time < PARSE_DATETIME_ISO8601(: stopTime)
    AND workflow_run.name = 'BC Lint'
    --AND (workflow_run.actor.login = 'ezyang' OR workflow_run.actor.login = 'albanD')
),
min_event_times AS (
  SELECT 
    head_sha,
    MIN(_event_time) AS min_event_time
  FROM 
    test_runs 
  WHERE 
    conclusion = 'failure'
  GROUP BY 
    head_sha
),
failures AS (
  SELECT 
    head_sha    
  FROM 
    test_runs 
  WHERE 
    conclusion = 'failure'
  GROUP BY 
    head_sha
)
SELECT 
  min_event_times.min_event_time AS min_event_time, 
  test_runs._event_time,
  test_runs.head_sha,
  test_runs.html_url, 
  test_runs.conclusion AS status
FROM 
  test_runs 
JOIN 
  min_event_times ON test_runs.head_sha = min_event_times.head_sha
WHERE 
  test_runs.head_sha in (select head_sha from failures)
ORDER BY 
  min_event_times.min_event_time DESC, _event_time DESC;
